page.title: 12SCHOOL ROUTINE
page.content: Most people travel by bus to school, but some walk and some come by car. The day starts at half nine with assembly and lessons start at nine- forty and each one lasts thirty five minutes. There is a break after the third lesson at eleven-twenty five, which lasts ten minutes. There are another two lessons before lunch break at twelve-thirty five. There are another four lessons in the afternoon, and the day ends at five to four when the buses come to collect the pupils. School in general is not considered too bad by the pupils, but discipline is fairly strict.
